inputs.topic_category_motivation: US defense spending is a macro driver influencing defense industry and broader economic activity.
inputs.motivation_for_relevance: FY2026 $1T defense budget is a clear macro driver that will likely lift UST10Y yields by ~5‑15 bp, boost defense‑sector equities, and support broader US equity indices; provides a dated catalyst and causal path.

llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: Article highlights upcoming $1T defense budget and AI spending, creating a new macro driver for US defense spending.
llm_topic_proposal_raw.name: US Defense Spending
